title: Promo denied
body: I played my last game in promo for s2 and i had a Win and a Lose.....last game i win and they tell me i was promoted for promo ......what i do...can riot help me??

replies.body:
If you where promoted then what was the problem?

Edit: I read the title again please describe your problem more clearly next time. Riot's servers can be a little slow at times, just wait a bit and you should be promoted if not then send a ticket to riot support.
they don't promote me....i had to remake the promo ...

I took a look into this, and it seems that you experienced a queue dodge during an earlier series.  [Queue dodging](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) will automatically count as a loss, and in this case ended the series.  

Since then, I see that you enter another series and were successfully promoted.  Congratulations!
